Summary: 2 times over the summer of 1980 in Houston TX 1 in daylight 1 at night.
divs: sighting detailsi was working at a gas station in houston tx. in 1980 and i looked up and saw a ufo it was a sphere at first coming straight at me and as it slowed down it turned into a diamond shape and then it was a diamond that was concave looking sides it happened so fast that when i said look at that it took off so fast it was gone in less then a second and when it took back off it went straight backwards at about a 22 1\2 degree angle from the original decent it didn't land it was out in the shy like i say it happened so fast that when i said look at that it disapered before anyone else saw it. about 3 to 6 months later my girlfriend "c.c." and myself was sitting in a field on the edge of houston one night on the hood of my car talking at watching the starts all of a sudden way out in space a bright light came on it got brighter and then dim and bright again then it looked like a shadow or something was moving down the light like someone walking down a stairs "c.c." said did you see that and i said no you were seeing things and she got mad i was joking with her the next day she said we ought to talk about what we seen but i blew her off i thought i was seeing things since i saw one earlier that summer and then 3 days later i ran into "a.f." and he said you won't believe what i saw 3 nights ago while driving down the interstate in north houston and i said wait don't say anything else let me tell you what i saw 3 nights ago and see if we saw the same thing so he shut up and listened as i told him what i saw in south houston the same night and when i was done "a.f." said yes that is what i saw to and i told him "c.c" and i was sitting in the field at the oil lease we work at at that night and we saw it to. i'm sure i was taken aboard a craft at least 2 times and they inplanted something in my nose and after it was there a few years it got infected and i pulled it out it was a very small piece of metal with some hairs hooked to it.i know i'm not crazy and this has been bothering me every since it happened. i'm not an artist but i could draw what i saw if need be. "r.m." i now live in northern michigan and don't know where the other 2 are
